formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Information Type:
formElement.documentation: Information Type. Possible options: System Dump; Profiles (for Domain only); Data Sources; XA Data Sources.

formElement.label: Information Type Context:
formElement.documentation: Information Type Context. At current implementation it is considered only when Information Type is Data Sources or XA Data Sources and JBoss launched in Domain mode. In this case it is considered as profile where information about data sources to be gathered.

formElement.label: Additional Options:
formElement.documentation: 'Additional Options' can be included into CLI call, e.g.: '/:read-resource(include-runtime=true,include-defaults=true)' can be called instead of '/:read-resource' if 'include-runtime=true,include-defaults=true' is provided within 'Additional Options'.
